name: Pinocchio
overview: Help Pinocchio become a real boy! Created by Gepetto, the puppet-maker. Pinocchio has been brought to life by the magic of the blue fairy. Now, join Pinocchio and his friend Jiminy Cricket as they embark on a terrific adventure. Help Pinocchio earn the badges of Truth, Bravery, and Unselfishness, and his wish to become a real boy will finally come true.
